suggest.yajra/laravel-datatables-export: Exporting of dataTables (excel, csv and PDF) via livewire and queue worker.
suggest.maatwebsite/excel: Exporting of dataTables (excel, csv and PDF) using maatwebsite package.
suggest.rap2hpoutre/fast-excel: Faster exporting of dataTables using fast-excel package.
suggest.dompdf/dompdf: Allows exporting of dataTable to PDF using the DomPDF.
suggest.barryvdh/laravel-snappy: Allows exporting of dataTable to PDF using the print view.
